snippet: Second-seeded Marquette opened the conference tournament in disappointing fashion, making an abrupt exit Thursday night, falling to seventh-seeded Louisville in the quarterfinals.
abstract: Louisville men's college basketball team defeats Marquette, 84-71, and Notre Dame defeats South Florida, 57-53, in Big East Conference tournament quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Marquette opened the conference tournament in disappointing fashion, making an abrupt exit Thursday night, falling to seventh-seeded Louisville in the quarterfinals.

headline.seo: Big East: Marquette Sent Home; Notre Dame Moves On
headline.main: Second-Seeded Marquette Sent Home by Louisville
headline.print_headline: Second-Seeded Marquette Sent Home by Louisville
headline.content_kicker: Louisville 84, Marquette 71 | Notre Dame 57, South Florida 53
